content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Construction and completion of a condominium housing development comprising two blocks of four/five-storey residential buildings with swimming pool, communal facilities and basement car park.
  • The Cornwall is an exclusive 99-unit freehold condominium tucked away in the prestigious Good Class Bungalow district off Holland Road, just a three-minute drive from Orchard Road and a short stroll from the popular Holland Village.
  • The development is set in a blend of contemporary classic and Balinese mystique, with tropical resort setting and lush landscaping.
CLIENT

Hillgate Investments Pte Ltd

LOCATION

Holland Road, Singapore

COMPLETION YEAR

2005
